expressions.TITLE: "Complete Factor"

entry_form.name: AS_GSS_FM_completeCriteriaForm

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
  label: "Mark Factor as Complete",
  skipAutoFocus: true(),
  instructions: "Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)",
  contents: rule!AS_GSS_GRD_SelectableFactorCompletionGrid(
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    completedCriteria: ri!completedCriteria
  ),
  buttons: rule!AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveButtons(
    confirmAccessibilityText:"Press Enter to save",
    confirmLabel: "Mark Factor Complete",
    confirmSaveInto: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!completedCriteria,
        expression: {
          a!save(
            fv!item.completedBy.username,
            loggedInUser()
          ),
          a!save(fv!item.criteriaStatus, {}),
          a!save(
            fv!item.criteriaStatus.refDataId,
            cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_CRITERIA_STATUS_COMPLETED
          ),

        }
      ),
      a!save(
        ri!userAction,
        cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SUBMIT
      )
    },
    confirmSubmit: true,
    cancelAccessibilityText: "Press Enter to cancel",
    cancelLabel: "Cancel",
    cancelSaveInto: a!save(
      ri!userAction,
      cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
    ),
    cancelSubmit: true,

  )
)

called_by: AS GSS Mark Criteria as Complete

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveButtons
sub_interfaces.description: Section with cancel and save buttons

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(
      date: ri!value
    ),
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align,
    showHyphenIfValueNull :ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Evaluation
expression_rules.description: Audit configuration for AS_GSS_Evaluation

data.sail_code:
{
  fieldName: "",
  auditFieldName: "",
  idField: "evaluationId",
  simpleFields: {
    "evaluationNumber",
    "evaluationTitle",
    "evaluationDesc",
    "solicitationId",
    "solicitationDesc",
    "solicitationDate",
    "evaluationStartDate",
    "evaluationDueDate",
    "evaluationCompletionDate",
    "completedBy.username",
    "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
    "evaluationMethod.refDataId",
    "evaluationChief.username",
    "contractingSpecialist.username",
    "contractingOfficer.username",
    "folderId",
    "office365FolderId",
    "deletionReason",
    "isActive",
    "isWeightedFactorsRequired",
    "isSignaturesRequired",
    "isEvaluatorMasked",
    "isOnSpotConsensus"
  },
  /*Add evaluationId / evaluation.evaluationId as foreignIdField to the child audit configurations*/
  complexFields: {
    rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_EvaluationDocument(),
    rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_EvaluationPhase(),
    rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_Criteria(),
    rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_EvaluationVendor(),
    rule!AS_GSS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_EvaluatorTeam()
  }
}

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)
data.definition:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters
expression_rules.description: Populated the parameters for starting the audit process

data.sail_code:
{
  auditParams: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_P_AuditProcessParameters'(
    newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!newObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),

    ),
    originalObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!originalObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),

    ),
    objectTypeNumber: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
    namespace: rule!AS_CO_UT_getTypeNamespace(type: ri!objectType),
    objectDse: ri!objectDse,
    auditDse: ri!auditDse,
    username: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!username,
      replacementValue: loggedInUser()
    ),
    externalAction: ri!externalAction,
    auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
    auditType: ri!auditType,
    manipulationAudit: ri!manipulationAudit,
    complexFieldName: ri!complexFieldName
  )
}
data.definition:
{
  auditParams: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_P_AuditProcessParameters'(
    newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!newObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),
    originalObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      value: ri!originalObjects,
      type: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
      
    ),
    objectTypeNumber: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),
    namespace: rule!AS_CO_UT_getTypeNamespace(type: ri!objectType),
    objectDse: ri!objectDse,
    auditDse: ri!auditDse,
    username: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!username,
      replacementValue: loggedInUser()
    ),
    externalAction: ri!externalAction,
    auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
    auditType: ri!auditType,
    manipulationAudit: ri!manipulationAudit,
    complexFieldName: ri!complexFieldName
  )
}

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation criteria details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

constants.description: SINGLE_OBJECT - Returns a single type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MANUAL_SYNC
constants.description:
Audit Action Code - "MANUAL_SYNC"
Action Code to track that the clause is modified using manual sync

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE
constants.description: DEACTIVATE - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
constants.description: REACTIVATE - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UNCHANGED
constants.description: UNCHANGED - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_INITIATED
constants.description: INITIATED - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_AGGREGATION
constants.description: AGGREGATION - Returns an array of Dictionary when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE
constants.description: DELETE - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_GAM_TXT_SEPARATOR_SPACE
constants.description: Value: space that can be used as a separator

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
constants.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY
constants.description: MODIFY - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MANUAL_UPDATE
constants.description: MANUAL UPDATE - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
constants.description: CANCEL.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Cancel" action

constants.name: AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD
constants.description: ADD - used by the auditing module

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SUBMIT
constants.description: SUBMIT.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Submit" action
called_by: AS GSS Mark Criteria as Complete

record_types.name: AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD

views.ui_expr:
rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationRatingsTab(
  evaluationId:rv!identifier ,
  evaluationFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "is null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  ),
  evaluationSubFactors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    evaluationId: rv!identifier,
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "not null"
    ),
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: false()
  )
)

rule!AS_GSS_FM_evaluationAuditHistory(
  evaluation: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation(
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  evaluationPhases: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationPhases(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor(
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationCriterias: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluatorTeams: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluatorTeam(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    getActiveAndInactive: true
  ),
  evaluationDocs:rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationDocuments(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    evaluationId: rv!record[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
    fetchAll: true()
  )
)

#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Number",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationNumber,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationNumber],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Title",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationTitle,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationTitle]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Desc",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationDesc,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationDesc]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Solicitation Desc",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.solicitationDesc,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.solicitationDesc]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Solicitation Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.solicitationDate,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.solicitationDate],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Start Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStartDate,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStartDate],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Due Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationDueDate,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationDueDate],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Completion Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationCompletionDate,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationCompletionDate],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Completed By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.completedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.completedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Method",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationMethod,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationMethod]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Chief",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationChief,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationChief]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Contracting Officer",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.contractingOfficer,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.contractingOfficer]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Contracting Specialist",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.contractingSpecialist,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.contractingSpecialist]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Signatures Required",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.isSignaturesRequired,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.isSignaturesRequired]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Weighted Factors Required",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Folder Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.folderId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.folderId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Office 365 Folder Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.office365FolderId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.office365FolderId]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.modifiedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.isActive,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.isActive]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Duplicated From Evaluation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.duplicatedFromEvaluationId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.duplicatedFromEvaluationId],
      align: "END"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)
